items.text: better length, angling into the batsman, but he is able to comfortably tuck this to square leg for a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Samuels, 1 run

items.preText: Pranath : "It's around this time that Rubel is introduced, and as on most occasions he'll decide where the tide will turn, either by leaking runs or getting wickets."
items.text: given some air outside off, and he gets down low to slap-drive it to extra cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, slightly short, he goes back to punch it past the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller ball on off, swipes across the line to send it to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flat but not quick, outside off and turning away from the right-hander. punched to extra cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: fuller on off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, he goes back and across to tuck it to the  leg side, but straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: good length on off, punched to deep cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: bowled off the inside edge short and outside off, it was the off-cutter. Samuels with no movement of feet, just stood in his crease and tried to drive on the up. The ball nips back enough to take the inside edge and crash into the stumps. He's thrown it away after starting slowly and just when he was beginning to look good
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Samuels, OUT

dismissal.text: MN Samuels  b Mohammad Saifuddin 19 (32b 2x4 0x6) SR: 59.37

items.preText: Hetmyer joins Hope. They've been West Indies' two best batsmen on tour I'd say. He'll have a slip for him
items.text: angled across, on a good length, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: back of a length angling across, steered to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, pushed back gently past the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling across, he wanted to flick it from waist high, but gets an under-edge that rolls off pad
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hetmyer, no run

items.preText: Sakib: "curious mind wants to know, a bowler is bowling outside off stump and you do not put a slip fielder.what kind of strategy is that? " - depends on the kind of bowler, match situation etc
items.text: ooh, that stopped on the pitch a bit. Good length on off and middle, turning in. Hope had to hold his defensive stroke
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: edged short of cover not coming on to the bat again, and he tries to transfer weight back and slap it through cover, but gets a leading edge. Falls just short
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: lets the ball come on to him that time and turns it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: drifts in, pitches on leg and turns back, Hetmyer had come well forward to defend. Hits him on the pad
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: given and that looked plumb Mehidy continues his hold over Hetmyer, who's going off without reviewing. Got stuck on the crease, Mehidy uses the angle from around the wicket to get it to dip and skid on, Hetmyer doens't know whether to go forward or back, ends up prodding from the crease with bat beside pad. The ball held its line though and hit pad. Replays show it would have clipped leg stump
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, OUT

dismissal.text: SO Hetmyer lbw b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 0 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: fuller on off, clipped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Powell, no run

items.preText:
Joynul: "So, miraz & hetmyer's hate-love story continues "

Mazhar: "6 out of 7 times by Mehedi to Hetmyre!!"
items.text: nipping back in sharply from back of a length on off, and keeping low. Half hearted appeal, but that was well down leg, defeated the batsman's attempted whip totally
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: good length on off, another off-cutter. he wants to drive, but gets an inside edge that rolls away towards square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

items.text: stays back to this one to tickle this round the corner to fine leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball outside off, defended solidly to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Powell, no run

items.text: comes forward to open the face of the bat and run it down to third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Powell, 1 run

items.text: another off-cutter, nipping back into the batsman from back of a length. that one also kept a tad low, he goes on the back foot to push it out to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run
